entry.title: Read My Palms; Tell Me I am Good Enough
entry.summary:
Author: HumbleWoodCarver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,642Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: “Okay. So …” Chan sat down next to Seungmin on the big bed and began slowly counting on his fingers. “I just want to make sure I got everything. You don’t really like being naked, sometimes you can’t speak after too much physical touch, and you want to be spanked over my knees a little in order to get out of your head enough to actually enjoy the sex. Oh, and no yelling. Only soft words. That sound about right?”Seungmin winced and folded into himself, pulling his knees up to his chest and hiding his face. “When you say it like that, it sounds impossible, hyung …” he whined, and felt Chan reach over to ruffle his hair and sigh softly, the gentle smile apparent in his voice.“It’s a tall order, but nothing I can’t handle. Hyung’s got you.”---It happens because, on a random Thursday night, after one too many shots of vodka, two too many drunken, self-deprecating jokes, and three too many encouraging friends standing over his shoulder as he sat at his laptop, Seungmin decides to order a daddy Dom from an escort website.

entry.title: Used, Truely
entry.summary:
Author: Askata_blue

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,329Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: “I don’t want to see you on your forearms, or on your back. You’ll stay up on all fours so we have easy access to both of your holes at all times. Got it?”Swallowing thickly, Felix nods. “Yes, hyung.”A dark look crosses Chan’s face at the breathiness in Felix’s voice. The air tenses. “Good. Oh, and also”, Chan smiles, condescending and mean, “you won’t talk.”Blinking rapidly, Felix’s fingers crunch up the mattress below. He holds back his stupefied “What?”, and instead goes for: “Uh… Not at all?”Crouching down, Chan thumbs gently along his cheek. His breath fans over Felix’s face. “No, baby. Not at all. You’re a toy for us.” His voice sounds as if it should be obvious. “Just a set of holes we can use to get off. So you’ll act like one. You’ll keep nice and quiet, you won’t say a thing and you especially won’t ask us to stop. Not even when you’re completely overwhelmed. Understood?”------------Or: Felix wants his boyfriends to use him any way they want to. Of course, his boyfriends can never deny him a wish.

entry.title: Escape the Silence
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,384Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 33

Summary: This is a sequel and does not stand alone. Please read A Prison of Red Lights first. Thanks! Run… …the wind whispered in the night, a familiar keening under the gaze of the half moon. …run… The whisper grew, echoing off the broken walls, building to a crescendo, the staccato of panting breaths keeping in rhythm with the wind’s urgent cry. Moonlight flashed in faded blue eyes as they turned pleading to the moon above. …run! Their prison of Red Lights left behind them, Chan and Hyunjin follow a call as they desperately seek to escape the burning world around them, guided by the moon and their love for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: What One Would do for One Goal
entry.summary:
Author: Chocolates_Flavor_is_Macha

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,515Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 241

Summary: Kim Seungmin's shop is almost completely done, but he needs one more thing. He needs a simple acceptance from the secret governing Magical Counsel, but they won't allow the young witch a shop without protection. He either needs a coven, or he needs a familiar, and he wants neither. This is because of his own past dealing with covens and his own personal family history. But he cannot legally run his shop without the Counsel's acceptance. With no signs of an answer, one of the biggest Crime bosses, Bahng Christopher Chan, just so happened to fall right into his backyard—a hole in his chest and little to no chance of surviving this. Well, Seungmin could do a lot worse than a powerful man like Chan. And besides, the Crime Boss has his own reason for survival, a simple goal that both men can accept. But it seems there's a lot more going on underneath the surface in both their lives, and they both have to work together to achieve their goals. Or die trying.

entry.summary:
Author: velvetgloss

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,688Chapters: 14/16Kudos: 215

Summary: "Happy collaring day, baby." Chan murmurs into his skin."Sorry." Felix says. "I didn't mean to wake you up.""'S alright," Chan says, pulling Felix in closer. "Rather be awake with you than sleeping anyway. Been awake long?""Not really." Felix says. "I just can't sleep anymore. I'm too excited.""Yeah?"Chan's little laugh, sleep-rough and pleased, warms his skin, and Felix can't help but bite his lip. He curls his foot around Chan's ankle, shifting closer as Chan's hand skates over his skin, over his hip, his thigh, until it finds its way to wrap around his cock. His touch is light, barely there, and still Felix shudders into it."Pretty baby," Chan says approvingly. "Half-hard just from thinking about my collar, little one?"OR,When Felix and Chan venture outside of their cozy, kinky bubble for a trip home to share the news of their engagement, they reckon with their past selves and confront the effects of the very different ways they’ve loved each other. entry.title: Through The Fence
entry.summary:
Author: DeluluCentral

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,888Chapters: 2/15Kudos: 4

Summary: Living next to Kim Namjoon has never been easy. Since I moved into this neighborhood three years ago, he and I have constantly butted heads. He's the kind of guy who always thinks he's right — ready to debate anything from takeout orders to politics. And then there's me, the opinionated aspiring journalist who never backs down. Naturally, we clash.Namjoon is a walking contradiction — distant and composed, yet there's a fire beneath the surface that I can't ignore. Maybe it’s his pride, or maybe it’s the way he tries to hide how much he feels. Either way, we always find ourselves in these petty little arguments. But lately, something’s changed. There’s a tension now. A charged silence between the words. A look that lingers a little too long.But when a good friend — and old flame — comes to town, things change. Feathers get ruffled, lines blur, and a choice needs to be made.“You can’t park like that,” I snapped, arms crossed as I eyed his crooked attempt at parallel parking.“It’s still within the lines,” he shot back, not even looking up from his phone.“Barely. You’re one bump away from being in my driveway.”He smirked — that infuriating, knowing smirk. “Maybe I like being close.”

entry.title: A Prison of Red Lights
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,696Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 146

Summary: Dark, faded blue eyes flashed with moonlight. “Let me go,” whispered Hyunjin, but his plea was met with a cold and unyielding stare. In a flash of almost inhuman speed, he was on his feet and the chains pulled taut as he strained against them. “I didn’t do anything! Let me go!” Chan didn’t flinch even as Hyunjin’s face came within centimeters of his own. “You exist.” The chains stopped clanking as Hyunjin relaxed, leaning against the pull of the chains, giving his body the oddly distorted look of a marionette tangled in its strings, accentuated by the red glow overhead. He looked up at Chan again, their eyes meeting. Then he spat on his face. Or my interpretation of the music video, "Red Lights" and how "Escape" is a continuation of the same story. A hunter and his captured prey grapple for control as they discover a connection deeper than their ingrained hatred for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.This is part one. "Escape" will be part two.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.
